Room.Name: Thackery's Pub
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large but run down tavern known as Thackery's Pub.
Room.LongDescription: A lot of mismatched furniture is scattered throughout the room, and a fire burns in a large fireplace. A group of loud singers are gathered at one end of the room, and a number of girls carry wine to the customers at the tables. This place is frequented mostly by farmers and local merchants, and they all seem to be having a good time. A few field hands and grape pickers are playing darts.
